text: Nan otarim Timoti, kɨ fo, Godɨn akam inigha izir gumazim fomɨra nɨn arazibar gun mɨkeme. Ezɨ kɨ akar kam gɨnɨghnɨgha, bizir nɨ damuamiba bar dar gun nɨ mɨgei. Kɨ kamaghɨn ifonge, nɨ nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Iesusɨn ikɨva an suiragh gavgavigh, uan araziba deravɨra da tuisɨgh arazir aghuibar gɨn mangɨ. Kɨ kamaghsua, nɨ Godɨn akam inigha izir gumazim nɨ ganɨngizir akar kabar gɨn mangɨ, egh tuavir kamɨn nɨ mɨdorozir aghuim mɨsoghɨva nɨghnɨzir gavgavimɨn aven tugh gavgafigh. Bizir kam bagha, kɨ akar kam nɨ ganɨdi. Ezɨ gumazir maba, me uan araziba deragha da tuisɨgha, arazir aghuibar gɨn mangan aghuagha da batosi. Egha tuavir kamɨn me uan nɨghnɨzir gavgavibagh asɨghasɨki.
